short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fire Force Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Fire Force background. Fire Force wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate through Fire Force wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Choose a random Fire Force background or set a favorite via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Convenient access to frequently visited websites.
8. Simple navigation to your bookmarked pages.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for swift navigation.
10. Instant links to Google applications.
11. Quick link to additional themes.
12. Easy social media sharing.
13. Immediate access to download wallpapers.
14. Fast access to gaming portals.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the Fire Force new tab.
